Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a green energy technology that directly coverts chemical energy into electricity.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of rare earth co-doped nanocrystalline zirconia electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Scandia stabilized zirconia (SSZ) shows the highest conductivity among zirconia based electrolytes for SOFCs.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of rare earth co-doped nanocrystalline zirconia electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the stability of the cubic phase, which is the desirable phase for high conductivity, can be an issue in SSZ electrolytes due to its transformation to other low-conducting phases at higher temperatures.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of rare earth co-doped nanocrystalline zirconia electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the present investigation, SSZ electrolyte was co-doped with ytterbia, gadolinia and ceria with an objective of improving the high-temperature phase stability.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of rare earth co-doped nanocrystalline zirconia electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Both the doped and co-doped compositions exhibited a single cubic phase in the as-processed condition.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of rare earth co-doped nanocrystalline zirconia electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The phase stability at high temperature was studied by aging the sintered pellets at 900 degrees C for 500 h in air.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of rare earth co-doped nanocrystalline zirconia electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction and transmission electron microscopy analysis revealed formation of small amount of the low-conducting tetragonal phase in 1 mol % ytterbia and gadolinia co-doped compositions on ageing which resulted in conductivity degradation.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of rare earth co-doped nanocrystalline zirconia electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Increasing the doping level to 2 mol% prevented the formation of the tetragonal phase.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of rare earth co-doped nanocrystalline zirconia electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The ceria co-doped composition (1 mol%), on the other hand, was clean without any sign of the secondary phases even after high-temperature ageing.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of rare earth co-doped nanocrystalline zirconia electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The rhombohedral 'beta' phase formed in the binary composition (SSZ) after sintering but was absent in all the co-doped compositions.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of rare earth co-doped nanocrystalline zirconia electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The conductivity of the co-doped samples was higher than the binary SSZ.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of rare earth co-doped nanocrystalline zirconia electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus, it can be said that rare earth co-doping is an effective way of improving the phase stability and conductivity of SSZ electrolytes.
Titulo: Phase stability and conductivity of rare earth co-doped nanocrystalline zirconia electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells
